\name{example data}
\alias{data}
\title{Data provided for examples}

\item{cat}{A dataframe containing data for the categorical trait. The data preferably is in different columns for each of the four classes of the trait and 0 indicating the species does not have this class, while 1 that it does. A species could have more than one categories (polymorphism).}

\item{tree}{The phylogenetic tree in phylo format. The tree must include all species in the trait dataset}
